price: 72.Wuxuu yiri: Miyaanan kugu odhan, adigu ma kareysid la jirkayga samir?
arabic: قَالَ أَلَمۡ أَقُلۡ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسۡتَطِيعَ مَعِيَ صَبۡرٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla alam aqul innaka lan tastaṭīʿa maʿiya ṣabran
